answers.answer: Are you taking a good multiple vitamin/mineral supplement?  You should try that - then see a dr. if you don't feel better.  You could be anemic.
get tested for diabetes, or eat if you havent. are you drinking lots of water?? go get tested. diabetes is easy to test for. and important to get treated.
